wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Waller (born 3 July 1957 in Northampton) is the official club doctor of Rangers Football Club. He was appointed to the position in 2018 by manager Steven Gerrard.
He was previously the doctor for the England Under-21 team, Liverpool, Aston Villa and Hull City. He has also served as a FA representative on the British Olympic Association Medical Committee and worked as a lecturer on sports injuries.

*Mark Waller (doctor) (born 1957), club doctor of Rangers Football Club
*Mark Waller (politician) (born 1969), member of the Colorado House of Representatives
